content:
HttpConfigurationContext Class

Definition

Supplies current context information to configuration-section handlers in ASP.NET applications.

In this Article

public class HttpConfigurationContext
Inheritance
System.Object
HttpConfigurationContext

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

The context information supplied by this class is for the current HTTP request.

Properties

VirtualPath

Gets the virtual path to the Web.config configuration file.

public string VirtualPath { get; }
Value
String

The virtual path to the Web.config file. Null when evaluating Machine.config; an empty string ("") when evaluating the root Web.config file for the site.
